XIOModule_Buffer Struct Reference

#include <xiomodule.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

u8 * NextBytePtr
unsigned int RequestedBytes
unsigned int RemainingBytes

Detailed Description

The following data type is used to manage the buffers that are handled when sending and receiving UART data in the interrupt mode. It is intended for internal use only.
